step.cmd: Select the tab for the type of the activity for which you want to search.
As needed, specify the search options within a specified start and end time.

info.note: To search for an activity using a barcode, select for an option and scan for the barcode specific to the option. The application supports the barcodes of standards Code 39 and Code 128 only.

taskbody.result: The activities that match the search criteria appear.To clear results and perform new search, select Reset in the page.
